Sciex

SCIEX has led the field of mass spectrometry and capillary electrophoresis for over 50 years, pioneering innovative solutions for the precision detection of quantification of molecules. PRODUCT SPOTLIGHT

Intabio ZT System

Comprehensive charge variant analysis made simple. The Intabio ZT system couples icIEF separation and UV detection with high resolution mass spectrometry on the ZenoTOF 7600 system
